page.title: 10Recreation
page.content: In Sleights there is a bowling green and a cricket field. The Esk provides good salmon and trout fishing as well as boating and canoeing. The region's moorland and dales provide excellent countryside and wildlife for walkers and tourists. Most houses have gardens or allotments. Many people spend some of their spare time gardening, especially in the summer months. Some people grow vegetables and flowers for local produce shows e.g. Sleights Show. In the Institute at Sleights, badminton classes, organisations such as W.I. and Young Farmers, whist and domino drives are held. The Scout Assosiation has a branch in the centre of Sleights. There is a day centre for O.A.P.s to socialise.
